Summary: I was videotaping Jupiter in the morning when a light passed by quickly, too fast for the ISS or a satellite, high magnitude to be captured with a video camera
divs: Sighting DetailsI was videotaping Jupiter in the morning when a light passed by in a straight line, too fast for a satellite and a high enough magnitude to be seen with a video camera
